an7.61:2.3: saññaṃ mā manasākāsi → saññaṃ manasikareyyāsi (s1-3) | saññaṃ manasākāsi (mr), taṃ saññaṃ mā bahulamakāsi → taṃ saññaṃ bahulaṃ kareyyāsi (s1-3) | taṃ saññaṃ bahulamakāsi (pts1, mr)
an7.61:11.4: nāhaṃ moggalāna sabbeheva samaggaṃ vaṇṇayāmi gahaṭṭhehi pabbajitehi kho ahaṃ moggallāna samaggaṃ vaṇṇayāmi (ka-ma)
an7.61:11.8: manussarāhasseyyakāni → manussarāhaseyyakāni (bj, s1-3, pts1), saṃsaggaṃ → samaggaṃ (mr)
an7.61:13.7: na kiñci → na ca kiñci (bj, s1-3, mr)
